# Test Non-Contiguous Group

## Controls

| Control (Dec) | Label | Range | Choices |
|---------------|-------|-------|---------|
| osc | OSC | 6 | |
| 10 | Waveform | 0-3 | Sine, Square, Saw, Triangle |
| 11 | Octave | -2-2 |  |
| 12 | Filter Cutoff | 0-127 |  |
| 13 | Filter Resonance | 0-127 |  |
| 14 | Detune | 0-127 |  |
| 15 | Level | 0-127 |  |
